name: Kid: Curse of the Jewel
description:
Once there was a boy, who dreamed to be like his father, he set out on a journey to uncover a mysterious idol that even his father couldn’t reach. He would have to follow a treacherous path through forests and caves to reach his final destination, a temple, hidden amongst it all, will he make it?

This is a game prototype that I've been working on for the past half a year, it is a mixture of a Japanese puzzle and dungeon crawler.

Would really like some criticism for what I currently have as I will continue working on the game throughout the year!
